description: Highlight keywords using JavaScript. Intended for every use case. Can e.g. be used to mark text in search results.
name: mark.js
readme:
# mark.js #### :sparkles: formerly known as jquery.mark or jmHighlight :sparkles: ##### Highlight keywords using JavaScript. Intended for every use case.
Can e.g. be used to mark text in search results.
